meanings.definition: A person or group that remodels something.
meanings.sent1: The remodelers worked hard to update the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The remodelers were skilled at transforming old houses into modern homes.
meanings.sent3: The remodelers joked that they could turn a pumpkin into a palace.
meanings.sent4: The remodelers were like artists, turning plain spaces into masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The remodelers were known for their ability to breathe new life into old buildings.

meanings.sent1: The remodelers completed the remodeling of the bathroom on time.
meanings.sent2: The remodelers were hired to oversee the entire remodeling project.
meanings.sent3: The remodelers decided to throw a party to celebrate the successful remodeling.
meanings.sent4: The remodelers approached the remodeling task with enthusiasm and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The remodelers' dedication to quality showed in every remodeling job they undertook.
